title: Ticket #3320: allow DMTCP checkpoints to be stored+retrieved on checkpoint server
description: This is needed for us to store DMTCP checkpoints on the LDG, since our shared filesystem won't scale. (We put a checkpoint server on each execute node.)
remarks:
2013-May-28 15:56:47 by pfc:
FWIW, on the LIGO Data Grid we currently have a checkpoint server per startd -- so although long-term we need the ability to change this and a central checkpoint server, initially an implementation that only supported our current config might be okay.

2013-Nov-22 14:08:06 by pfc:
Closing this for now; KVM checkpointing looks much more promising. Will reopen only if KVM checkpointing doesn't work out for some reason.
creator: pfc
